creatures.name: Echo-Leech

attacks.name: Latch & Siphon
attacks.special: On hit: target makes Breath/Willpower check TN 50 or loses 1 Stamina per round (stacking to 3).

behaviors: Sunlight or Ward-Mesh reduces aggression (-10 to hit).
weaknesses: Counter-Cant: ELI stuns for 1 round (no action).

creatures.name: Echo-Brute

attacks.name: Smash
attacks.special: On hit: test Knockdown TN 50 or fall prone.

behaviors: Prioritizes lanterns and doors; attempts to darken the area.
Ignores prone targets if another light source is within 6m.
weaknesses: Counter-Cant: ELI reduces damage by 1 die for 2 rounds.
Angel-Bound Nail pins it in place for 1 round (no move).

creatures.name: Chorus Node

effects: All echo entities within radius gain +10 to hit.
Fear checks within radius are at -5.

interactions: Mass of Repose (success) silences aura for 1 minute.
Counter-Cant: ELI cancels the aura for 2 rounds on success.
weaknesses: Ward-Mesh Lantern within 3m halves the aura bonuses.
If destroyed, remaining echoes make morale check TN 50 or scatter.
